title: Group portrait of Shriners wearing tuxedos, chain collars, and Sahara Temple No. 2 fezzes, including, front row, fourth from left: Past Imperial Potentate Joseph Givens, Imperial Sports Director Marshall Johnson, Illustrious Potentate Harry Keen, Imperial Potentate Booker Alexander, and Assistant Imperial Promotional Director John Goggins, gathered for the Potentate's Ball at Royal Ballroom for the Pittsburgh's Sahara Temple, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
